class.name: RootsOfUnityTest

javadoc.text: Unit tests for the {@link RootsOfUnity} class.

method.name: testGetNumberOfRoots
method.comment: Testing -5 right after 5 is important, as the roots in this case are not recomputed.

method.name: testComputeRoots
method.comment: Testing -n right after n is important, as the roots in this case are not recomputed.
